short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: sometimes the best choice is no choice

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sometimes the best option is no option. Overwhelmed by choices in this world, I've taken the liberty of giving the people one more choice to eliminate many. After installing idontlike users, while on Facebook, will see a thumbs-up/thumbs-down icon appear in the URL bar which they can click to hide all instances of "Like" on Facebook. Users minds will feel instantly at ease as thousands of choices vanish before their eyes, as quickly as they came.
